Plot all "choice-level" MMs

plot_projoint_choice_level_mm.Rd

This function produces choice-level MM plots given a projoint_results object, the output from the projoint function.

Usage

plot_projoint_choice_level_mm(
  x,
  .type = "pointrange",
  .estimates = "corrected",
  .labels = NULL,
  .show_attribute = TRUE,
  .remove_xaxis = FALSE,
  .xlim = c(0, 1),
  .plot.margin = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

A projoint_results object.

.type

Type of plot: "bar" (default) or "pointrange".

.estimates

Which estimates to plot: "corrected" (default) or "uncorrected".

.labels

A character vector for x-axis labels (optional).

.show_attribute

Logical; show attribute as plot title (for pointrange type).

.remove_xaxis

Logical; remove x-axis (for pointrange type).

.xlim

Limits of x-axis (for pointrange type).

.plot.margin

Plot margins (for pointrange type).

...

Additional arguments (currently unused).

Value

A ggplot object.
